edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.textsegmenter.struct
Class ContextVector

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.textsegmenter.struct.ContextVector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
public class ContextVector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable

Context vector. Maps string to frequency count.

Author:
Freddy Choi, Philip R. Burns. Modified for integration in MorphAdorner.

Use of this code is free for academic, education, research and other non-profit making uses only.

See Also:
